```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

import the weather data
```{r}
data("weather_df")
```

making our first plot :-)
```{r}
ggplot(data = weather_df, mapping = aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```
